job.title: Data Scientist
job.industry: Health, Wellness and Fitness,Medical Practice,Hospital & Health Care
job.description: ltstronggtWork That Matters ltstronggt Our work is 24 hours a day 365 days a yearltbrgtltbrgtNo one has more expertise treating children than Childrens Hospital Los Angeles CHLA is the only childrens hospital in California to make the prestigious US News ampamp World Report Honor Roll of Best childrens hospitals and is nationally ranked in all 10 pediatric specialtiesltbrgtltbrgtJoin a hospital where the work you do will matterto you to your colleagues and above all to our patients and families At times the work may be challenging but it is always rewarding We hope youll come and find out for yourselfltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtIts ltemgtWork That MattersltemgtltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtThe Data Scientist conducts research in medical applications of data science by applying techniques and models from machine learning and computational statistics to large amounts of clinical dataltbrgtltbrgtIn consultation with senior technical members of the team designs and executes research and development projects and experiments using advanced computational techniques to generate novel medical insights and to build clinical decision support systemsltbrgtltbrgtAdditional information about the team and previous projects can be found at httpvpicunetltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtMinimum QualificationsWork Experience ltstronggtBachelors Degree in a Stem field ltstronggtandltstronggt 2 years experience conducting research in computer science statistics or algorithm development or MSPhD in Stem field Publications are a plusltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtEducationLicensureCertifications ltstronggtBS in Computer Science Statistics Physics Electrical Engineering or related field MS in Computer Science Statistics Physics Electrical Engineering or related field PhD preferred Graduatelevel coursework in machine learning data mining visualization statistics artificial intelligence probabilistic models or optimization
